Name: maximize_completed_story_points
Description: Sum of story points for all completed user stories

Name: minimize_open_blockers
Description: Total number of blockers not in 'resolved' status

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Sum of priorities for all features implemented

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize the average story points a team can complete

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Sum of effort for all tasks in a sprint

Name: maximize_team_availability
Description: Sum of availability for all workers

Name: maximize_budget_adherence
Description: Maximize the project budget, as a proxy for staying within the allocated budget

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize the achievement status of the sprint goal

Name: minimize_sprint_end_date
Description: Minimize the sprint end date, effectively minimizing its duration assuming a fixed start

Name: maximize_user_story_priority
Description: Sum of priorities for user stories selected for the sprint

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize the team satisfaction score from the retrospective

Name: maximize_release_features
Description: Maximize the number of features included in a release plan, assuming the attribute holds a count
